programme.title: Mrs Henderson Presents
programme.desc: 1937. Mrs Henderson, a woman of wealth and connections, has just buried her beloved husband. And now she's bored. Friends suggest she finds a hobby and to their amazement she buys the Windmill theatre. When business dips she comes up with a new idea to get the crowds back - put naked girls on stage! But when the government threatens to shut the theatre Mrs Henderson's fighting spirit is revealed.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
programme.desc: Former `Top Gear' presenter and opinionated `The Sunday Times' and `The Sun' columnist Jeremy Clarkson presents the rebooted version of `Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?', the 12-question quiz with a £1,000,000 prize. Each contestant can use three traditional lifelines: 50-50 which removes half of the answers, Ask the Audience which polls the studio audience for their answer, and Phone a Friend, wherein the contestant can call a friend for 30 seconds to ask for their advice. However, there is now a fourth lifeline: Ask the Host, where the contestant can ask Clarkson if he knows the answer to the question, and there is also a new second `safety net', previously set at £32,000, which is now able to be set by the contestant themselves. Also, contestants must first win their chance to play the quiz by winning the Fastest Fingers First round, competing against other potential players to be the quickest to answer a question with sequenced answers.

The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: The Story of Europe
programme.desc: The Story of Europe - State of Play: Europe has never experienced such a long period of peace and prosperity as after the Second World War. When the Iron Curtain falls in 1989, the dream of a Europe united in peace and freedom seems finally to become reality. But whether financial or refugee crisis - the European euphoria has disappeared, nationalists are on the rise again.

programme.title: Tales of the Cold War
programme.desc: Some just counted tanks, others stole blueprints for nuclear bombs. During the Cold War, Germany was the battleground for thousands of spies and spotters. The threat of nuclear overkill provoked a near insatiable hunger for intelligence on both sides of the Iron Curtain.

programme.title: The 8th Continent?
programme.desc: Fifty years ago for the first time astronauts in the shape of Neil Armstrong and Edwin "Buzz" Aldrin, put their feet on the lunar surface. But does the rendezvous in space remain the climax in the relationship between man and moon? Or could the moon become our second earth in the future, maybe even the eighth continent?

programme.title: The Silicon Valley Revolution
programme.sub-title: How a few nerds did change the world
programme.desc: The Silicon Valley Revolution - How a few nerds did change the world - From Hippies to the first PC: Todays' Silicon Valley is the home for multi-million dollar IT companies. In the beginning, however, it was unsophisticated, colourful, chaotic, and revolutionary. Hippies and amateur entrepreneurs initiated an unprecedented revolution: the pioneers of the PC wanted to change the world in an attempt to dethrone the “Big Brother”.

programme.title: Stalin's Daughter
programme.desc: It is a sensation in the midst of the Cold War. Stalin's daughter Svetlana Alliluyeva flees to the West. During her childhood in the center of power, she was Joseph Stalin's favorite child. But death and violence overshadow her life. Her mother and brother die, relatives are killed, Stalin has her lover abducted.

programme.title: Operation Peter Pan
programme.desc: In 2016, a historic moment arrived when Barack Obama spoke in Cuba to the inhabitants of the island nation and promised a future together. For the first time in more than 50 years, an American president had entered the communist country and turned towards an erstwhile enemy. However, the US economic embargo against Cuba continues. It sanctions the socialist state – although the UN General Assembly recently again called it a violation of international law. Many Cubans are therefore sceptical about a new political future, despite the friendly words of the American President. Their distrust is deep. It is based on over fifty years of history and the policies of the United States towards their country. For years, the Cuban government has raised serious allegations against their big neighbour. The film "Operation Peter Pan" tracks these allegations.

programme.title: In Search of Santa Claus
programme.desc: The amazing transformation of a holy man from Turkey into the world-wide symbol of Christmas cheer. He's one of the most widely recognized figures in the world but what are the origins of St. Nicholas, and how did he become Santa Claus? With criminological acumen, this one-hour documentary sorts the myths from the facts to present the true story of the first multi-national saint, revered by the Catholic, Protestant and Orthodox churches alike.

programme.title: If There Was No Land On Earth
programme.desc: The second episode takes you on an underwater adventure to the remote and beautiful islands of Fiji, where people face the formidable predators of the ocean. Through stunning underwater world teeming with life and intimate interviews with passionate shark feeders we will capture the raw power and beauty of these incredible creatures. We will also shed light on the importance of shark conservation and the urgent need to protect these apex predators from human threats.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode we witness a desperate mission to save a spooked impala that got it's leg caught in a fence. Luckily the volunteers reacted quickly and made a plan to help the impala. One of the highlights for any volunteer at Imire is to interact with the incredibly clever elephants. Daily training is done the elephants to hone their skills. It's hard to believe but these gentle giants can actually track poachers. And, there is always time for fun tasks. It is vital for the volunteers to bond with each other so the Imire management team, devise amazing fun tasks, including this one, whereby 2 teams are challenged to build their own raft and race across the dam. After many laughs there is one clear winner.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode the volunteers experience close up encounters with iconic creatures. It's not often people can experience a walk with elephants and really appreciate the size of these beasts. Giraffe also happen to wonder close which makes the experience even more epic. The volunteers get to handle paint ball guns to get an understanding of how the anti poaching team operates and it seems like Kristina is a pretty good shot! And, nothing stands in the way of hard work, as it's all hands on deck securing electric strands to a border fence. This will dramatically improve the security at Imire.

programme.title: The Return of the Osprey
programme.desc: The Osprey is the only raptor in the world to feed exclusively on fish. This migratory bird has lived throughout central Europe for a long time, nesting there in the summer months. But the species has gradually moved to more northerly regions of the continent, far from the persecution caused by human expansion. Wendy and Denis have set launched an ambitious challenge of reintroducing the Osprey to Switzerland, a century after its disappearance.

programme.title: Aging in the Wild
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore how different animal species react to impending death. We explore the factors that lead animals to their final resting places: disease, injury, predation, drought, famine.

programme.title: If There Was No Land On Earth
programme.desc: The first episode tells about the fascinating annual migration of the Humpback whales to the warm and tranquil waters of Tonga's Vava'u archipelago, where they mate, give birth, and nurture their young. The majesty and intelligence of these magnificent creatures is truly breathtaking. From the playful antics of newborn calves through the haunting songs of adult males to the human impact on their habitats and lives – an inspiring journey.

programme.title: Red Panda
programme.desc: The Red Panda is undoubtedly one of the most beautiful animals on earth and this is the first ever intimate portrait ever made.

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: In a land of dangers, plant-eating animals are always at risk, and never more so than at the time of their birth out on the open they are vulnerable and there are few places to hide. But luckily some are born to run …

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: It's a water world and life couldn't survive without it. And thanks to it, a mind blowing diversity of creatures thrive beneath the surface. Born to enjoy the riches underwater they must master their body's adaptations, learn to find food, to escape danger and above all become expert swimmers! Whether it's in rivers, on beaches or in the deep ocean, all must overcome the obstacles and fulfil their destiny, all are born to swim! Of all the habitats on earth, the ocean is perhaps the most challenging. Here salt, temperatures, currents and predators can make life difficult it's not an obvious place to want to bring up your babies… But even in these waters generation after generation beats the odds. They have overcome the challenges and become some of the most beautiful and graceful of creatures. But any baby born to swim has a lot to learn… All over the world there are creatures born to swim, and though humans are not, we seem determined to join them. Perhaps we are envious of their grace. Maybe we are all water babies at heart

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: Baby animals beguile with their innocent charm. But while some remain harmless, others have a deep-rooted instinct. It may take weeks or months of training to hone their skills. Their landscapes and lifestyles maybe very different, but these babies are born to hunt.

programme.title: Asia
programme.sub-title: Secret Lives Hidden Places II - S2 E02
programme.desc: In Sabah, northern Borneo, flows the 560km-long Kinabatangan River. Nowhere else in Sabah are wild animals as easily spotted as along this river: orangutans, elephants, crocodiles, and proboscis monkeys. However, biodiversity is threatened as more rainforest gives way to palm oil plantations. Wildlife ventures into inhabited areas in search of food, leading to conflicts. Locals are fighting to preserve the rainforest and its unique wildlife, demonstrating that conservation and prosperity can coexist even in a modern society.

programme.title: Asia
programme.sub-title: Secret Lives Hidden Places II - S2 E03
programme.desc: The jungle in northern Vietnam is nearly impenetrable, with some areas never touched by humans. The remote rainforests of Pu Mat National Park serve as a refuge for endangered wildlife such as black bears, monkeys, and pangolins. Tuan, a biologist and bear specialist, embarks on an expedition to these untouched regions of the park in search of bears. The most hunted animal here is the pangolin, sought after for its scales believed to have medicinal properties and its meat considered a delicacy. A small Vietnamese conservation organization fights for the survival of this species.

programme.title: Asia
programme.sub-title: Secret Lives Hidden Places II - S2 E04
programme.desc: The Great Gobi National Park in southwestern Mongolia shelters one of the last populations of wild Bactrian camels, amid its ancient and mysterious desert landscape. With around 800 critically endangered animals, the Gobi remains one of the world's most sparsely inhabited and inhospitable regions, yet its allure is undeniable, offering a captivating backdrop for encounters with wild camels and stories of people deeply connected to nature.

programme.title: Amplify: USVI
programme.desc: Host Naydyeyah Acoy-Thomas traces the rich, layered history of St. Croix's musical roots, uncovering the deep ties to African, European, and indigenous Taíno traditions. Featuring voices like Asta Williams, Willard John, Rashidi Clenance, and Vio International, the episode explores how genres such as quelbe, calypso, and scratch band music were born from the island's complex past. Through storytelling, performances, and cultural insight, Naydyeyah reveals how the rhythms of resilience and celebration continue to echo through generations.

programme.title: aespa 'Rich Man' MV
programme.desc: The title track “Rich Man” is a dance song highlighted by its striking, gritty electric guitar sound. Its lyrics convey themes of self-confidence and self-love, while the addictive topline and dynamically evolving band sound blend with the members' distinctive vocals to deliver an unrestrained burst of energy.aespa delivers fresh energy with their sixth mini-album “Rich Man.”

programme.title: XngHan&Xoul 'Heavenly Blue' Intro Video
programme.desc: The upcoming single features “Heavenly Blue”, a refreshing and trendy EDM pop track rooted in Chill House. The song stands out with its soft-textured kick drums, dreamy synth pads, and emotionally charged vocals, delivering a captivating and immersive sound.Seung-han (XngHan) is set to unveil his unique musical identity through his highly anticipated solo debut.

programme.title: XngHan&Xoul 'Waste No Time' MV
programme.desc: The title track, “Waste No Time,” is an electronic dance song that captures XngHan's aspirations as he stands at a new starting point. Characterized by clear and bright synth leads, bass, and a straightforward, addictive melody, the track's lyrics express a youthful resolve to seize the moment and move forward without hesitation.XngHan is making his solo debut under the artist brand XngHan&Xoul, which he launched himself.

programme.title: HAECHAN 'TASTE OF SUN'
programme.desc: The album carries a dual meaning: sharing HAECHAN's musical “taste” with fans, while also inviting listeners to “taste” the music he has created for the first time as a solo artist.HAECHAN's first full-length album “TASTE” consists of 11 R&B tracks of diverse charm, including the title track “CRZY.”

programme.title: HAECHAN 'TASTE OF LIGHT'
programme.desc: [Track List] 7. Talented 6. Intermission 8. WYN? (Feat. 김하온 (HAON)) 3. ADRENALINE 5. Roll With Me 10. Grey Rain 2. CRZY 1. Camera Lights A sneak peek at HAECHAN's 1st full album 'Taste.' 4. Love Beyond 11. Outro (Back In The Studio)9. Should Be

programme.title: Left Behind by LOVE
programme.desc: A collection of songs that linger in the silence love leaves behind—filled with regret, longing, and memories that won't quite fade.

programme.title: SUPER JUNIOR K.R.Y Best Vocal Collection
programme.desc: For those moments when heartfelt ballads feel just right—SUPER JUNIOR-K.R.Y.'s harmonies gently linger and leave a lasting impression.

programme.title: aespa 'Dirty Work' MV
programme.desc: “Dirty Work” is a dance track with catchy synth bass and cool vocal melodies, showing off a more Chill and Cool side of their sound. In the music video, the members turn into bold resistance fighters who take on any kind of “dirty work” for each other, highlighting their strong sense of unity. The performance blends fierce, powerful moves with a hint of sensual flair, creating a stage that's full of contrast and energy.

programme.title: KEY 'HUNTER' MV
programme.desc: The performance features refined choreography that highlights KEY's delicate expressiveness and intense energy, delivering a conceptual stage that captivates from start to finish. SHINee's KEY's title track “HUNTER” is a dance song combining grand bass, heavy kicks, rhythmic guitar riffs, and rich synth pads. Its lyrics capture the “ecstasy in pain” of obsession within a complex relationship, heightened by KEY's dynamic vocals. KENZIE, who has worked on KEY's signature songs, took part in the writing and composing, showcasing their trusted synergy.

programme.title: JOY 'Love Splash!' MV
programme.desc: Red Velvet's JOY has released her first mini-album, 'From JOY, with Love'. The title track, “Love Splash!”, is a refreshing pop dance song that blends fluttering bass, soft piano, and bell sounds in perfect harmony. In particular, the story of honestly confessing love to someone who stirred waves in a once-calm heart—like a still ocean—and eventually diving into love together (Splash!) is brought to life through JOY's delicate vocals. Set against the backdrop of a cool summer seaside, the song vividly captures the exhilarating moment when love begins. Her expressive delivery adds even more sparkle and charm to the song's vibrant energy.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: With the power completely out in Berry Bitty City, the girls go on a camping trip to be out of the way of the Berrykin work crews. Lemon is nervous because she believes there is a creepy creature in the forest (that she read about in a book Blueberry loaned her), and the girls get the nervous bug, but Strawberry turns their apprehension into fun by daring her friends to stay out in the woods the longest!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls are driven to distraction by their frisky puppies frolicking all over Berry Bitty City! Full of energy and thinking that everything in town is a toy for them to play with, they cause comical mayhem wherever they go. Strawberry suggests the pups need a place of their own where they can play, a dog park! The girls decide to call in Huckleberry, who runs an animal hotel in Berry Big City, to help design the park.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The girls plan a formal afternoon lawn party tea to inaugurate their new dog park. Plum is in charge of decorations, Cherry music, and Strawberry snacks. There's even a giant, dog-shaped ice sculpture. As the girls get dressed, Raspberry puts the finishing touches on the high-fashion hats that will accompany their beautiful gowns. At last everything is ready. But when the gate opens... the puppies back away!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.sub-title: The Berry Biggest, Berry Baddest Bakeoff
programme.desc: Berry Bitty City is abuzz as Berrykin Bloom introduces the biggest, juiciest, strangest fruit anyone has ever seen! It's the size of a house, shaped like a strawberry, colored like a watermelon and has a spiky pineapple top. "I call it the sparklestrawwaterpineberry!" says Berrykin Bloom. Princess Berrykin declares it the greatest achievement in Berryculture she's ever witnessed.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry hire twins Sweet & Sour to help out in Strawberry's café, so Strawberry will have time to appear in an internet fashion contest.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry's world-traveling cousin Apple Dumplin' stops at Berry Bitty City. What starts as a brief visit becomes a series of comical misadventures that ends with Apple finding a new home with Strawberry and her friends.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry's fashion podcast is saved by Apple, then almost sabotaged by Sweet and Sour when Lemon's "mood hair" runs amok, acting like the bickering twins, and the twins' comical argument is accidentally broadcast on the "berrynet."

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When a comedy of errors causes Orange, Plum and Cherry to arrive late to their campout, they start off their annual tradition of telling tall-tales around the campfire.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Cherry Jam is so enjoying staying in Berry Bitty City, that she calls her managers in Big Bitty City and informs them that she is going to stay for a much needed vacation! Strawberry and the girls are thrilled that she will be with them for a little longer, and they do all they can to make their guest comfortable. But Cherry doesn't want to be treated like a guest she wants to fit in and contribute to the community.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Apple feels left out of a Berryball game and an advanced ballet class, she invents some "groove booties" programmed to dance to any beat. She temporarily impresses her friends with her dance moves, but when the groove booties go out of control and threaten the town's Berryball game, she is forced to fess up.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When the girls discover that Apple's groove booties can teach the pups to dance, Plum gets an idea for a Doggie Dance Show. Wanting to impress them, Huck offers to have TomTom join the show... despite the pup's obvious dislike of performing in public. It's up to Strawberry to help Huck see that he should not force TomTom into something he just doesn't want to do.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When a simple tune Cherry composes goes viral on the Berryweb, Cherry quickly gets fed up with everyone listening to this song, everywhere, all the time. She goes to comic lengths to get some peace so she can compose the song she's suppose to write for the Queen of Berryvania.

programme.desc: Strawberry and her friends love to dance - and the Peculiar Purple Pieman of Porcupine Peak is taking advantage of that!

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Howie and the gang get trapped in the basement during the biggest party of the year. Then, the Banana Cabana needs to get one star from a reviewer or Howie will lose the hotel.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Howie auditions to become Dirk Danger's new movie sidekick - but Octo gets the job! Then, Howie finds a lost toy that - when you add water to it - becomes a monster truck!

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Howie must be extra nice to his pals so that the Ear Wax Elf will leave him a gift for his latest blob of wax. Then, Howie quits the hotel biz to try to lure his hero Dirk Danger out of retirement.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: When Howie injures Batty in a stunting accident, he takes over as Poodle's assistant while Batty recuperates at the Banana Cabana. Then, thinking he has psychic predictive powers, Poodle kidnaps Duck.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Howie does everyone's jobs - to help him decide who should be Employee of the Month. Then, Howie and the staff collect saliva for Octo, whose tongue has dried up.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Howie has to save the hotel from an overgrown, animal-swallowing plant. Then, a condiment storm is coming, and all of Howie's pals are trapped outside.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: To avoid being in Bunny's play, Howie and Octo attempt to travel into the future! Then, Piggy has to complete his final ninjitsu-chef test and defeat a spicy goulash!

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Howie is kicked out of the Dirk Danger fan club and needs to find a new hero. Then, the Banana Cabana is visited by Burt and Burt - two gassy bulls who just want to trash the joint.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Howie's 'long-lost brother' shows up to claim his half of the hotel. Then, Bunny organises a scavenger hunt but accidentally offers up the hotel as the prize.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Howie is treated like a hero for saving a squirrel (when really the squirrel saved him)! Then, Poodle attacks the Banana Cabana with Cap'N Fizzy's pirate ship - it's up to Howie to stop her.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Octo the safety monitor tries to make the Banana Cabana TOO safe - with dangerous results! Then, Narwhal's biggest fan wins a 'spend a day with Narwhal' contest - but she ends up falling for Howie!

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Looking for a new challenge, Howie converts the hotel into a minimum security prison. After an unexpected toilet mishap, the Banana Cabana winds up floating on the high seas - becoming a 'boatel'!

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Poodle builds a robot Howie and uses it to try to take over the Banana Cabana. Then, Narwhal's obnoxious old partner shows up - and wants to put the old act back together again.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: A bossy Jellyfish sticks himself to Octo's head and starts to take over Octo's personality. Then, Howie gets the TV remote stuck to his head, and develops strange new powers!

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: After several days of bad weather, Duck builds an artificial sun that never goes down. Then, Narwhal confesses his greatest secret ever... he never learned how to swim!

programme.title: The King's Tournament
programme.desc: Rival to the King, Jorah Tightwad thinks his knights – the Tighty Knighties – are easily better than the NEXO-Knights, so he challenges King Halbert to prove who's better during the King's Birthday Tournament. It's the King's birthday! To celebrate, the Queen and Macy always throw him a great, big birthday party consisting of a feast on birthday eve and a tournament the next day. At the birthday banquet is JORAH TIGHTWAD (last seen in episode 104.) He's goading the King (and on his birthday, even) and going on and on about how his knights are better than the NEXO-Knights. The King protests, but Jorah asks “How many magical books have your knights recovered? None, zilch, zero.” But he produces the BOOK OF ENVY, which his superior knights captured from Jestro. The next day, the NEXO-Knights square off against Tightwad's four knights: JOUSTING BEEBER, BRICKNEY SPEARS, SHIA LABLADE and THE BLOK. We see that all these knights are envious of the NEXO-Knights: their weapons, their fame, their hair, etc. Macy is also disappointed to find out she CAN'T fight in the tournament – she's agreed to be in “princess mode” for her father's birthday. During the tournament, we see that Tightwad's knights are amazing in fighting contests. They all pair-off with knights who have their same weapons skills. Tightwad makes fun of the NEXO-Knights as his knights do well. Jestro and the Book of Monsters discover that Tightwad has the Book of Envy and he and his monsters attack the tournament. Then we learn that Tightwad's knights might be good tournament fighters, but they can't handle real fights and the NEXO-Knights must save them! Macy is finally able to join in the fight when she sees Magmar show up on the flank. The NEXO-Knights successfully defend the king, but Jestro gets away with the Book of Envy. Tightwad must admit his knights never won the book from Jestro he got the book when Merlok blasted books of magic across the realm. Tightwad's knights all admit that they really admire the NEXO-Knights.

programme.title: Monster Chef
programme.desc: Axl and Chef Éclair must enter a cooking contest to try to keep Jestro from getting the hottest chili recipe in the realm. Knighton celebrity chef GOBBLETON RAMBLEY announces that he's developed the hottest chili recipe ever created. Now, he intends to give the recipe to the winner of his “Hottest Chili Cook-Off Competition” cooking show on Knighton TV. He'll turn over his famous Chili Cookbook with the hottest chili recipe on the last page. It's so unique it can't be recreated without it. Jestro and the Book of Monsters think they MUST have that recipe. “Hot chili makes hot monsters!” Merlok knows that this recipe, in the wrong hands – meaning Jestro's – could be dangerous. But when the Knights appeal to the egomaniacal chef, he says the only way to get the recipe is to win it from him. So Axl and Chef Éclair decide to enter. The team that creates the hottest chili will win Rambley's cookbook. Chef Éclair is unsure that Axl has the skills to help them win the competition, but, as we see through funny cooking show bits, Axl is quite good and they become a pretty good team. (We will also learn that years ago, Rambley stole one of Éclair's best recipes and they don't like each other.) While watching the multi-part competition, Aaron and Lance have a contest of their own: who can eat the hottest chili. Axl and Éclair actually win the competition, coming up with a raging hot chili recipe. Before they can claim their prize, Jestro and his monsters attack with Magmar leading the way on his siege tower. They must get that cookbook! During the battle, Rambley's cookbook is accidentally melted. After the battle, Rambley announces his new quest: to make the sweetest ice cream ever! While Axl and Éclair cook happily in the kitchen of the Fortrex, back in the Redoubt of Ruination, Jestro and Lavaria are attempting to recreate Rambley's chili recipe. They keep spooning various recipes of chili into the Book of Monsters. “Nope, not hot enough…waaaay too much garlic….you call that hot?!” (BELCH!)

programme.title: Knight Out
programme.desc: When the other NEXO-Knights decide they need a vacation from Clay, they send him on a holiday not knowing that he's going to a resort that houses an evil book or that Jestro will be heading there, too. Clay needs a vacation. Or, actually, the knights need a vacation from Clay! Clay is so super-focused that sometimes they just can't take it: training, training, maintenance, the Knights' Code tests then…more training. Even Merlok 2.0 is exhausted and he has no physical form! So, the Knights send Clay off on a holiday against his will (arranged by Lance because if there's one thing he can do it's plan a vacation.) But unbeknownst to the other Knights, Jestro and the Book of Monsters are tracking an evil book. A book that they suspect is located near the resort “Exalted Towers” renowned for its exquisite service, where Clay is staying. It's the BOOK OF CRUELTY and Clay notices that it's affecting the “high class” resort where Lance has booked him: the service is terrible, the staff is nasty, and everyone seems to take joy in being cruel to him (and to each other.) Meanwhile, the other Knights are having a terrible time because they realize that Clay takes charge of the basic maintenance of almost everything in the Fortrex. Stuff starts breaking down, chores are not getting done and everyone is getting on each other's nerves. Clay senses things are “off” at the resort, and discovers the book they've been using as the guest register is really the Book of Cruelty. As Clay scoops it up, he looks outside to see…Jestro and his monsters arrive on the Evilmobile. Clay battles as best he can on his own by setting traps and being cunning but he's finally caught. Just when it looks like this will be the cruelest vacation ever the other Knights arrive on their vehicles! They spring into action, free Clay, and battle and defeat Jestro and the monsters – though Jestro escapes. The Knights make Clay promise to never go on vacation again.

programme.title: Cheat Code
programme.desc: Competing over who can ask Zoey to join their Sheep Week team, Logan cheats and unwittingly endangers the video game based Cyber Realm.

programme.title: The Bigger Picture
programme.desc: When the kids meddle in their teacher's dream to find test answers, they realize that in dreams, sweet little Ms. Putnam isn't so sweet... or little!

programme.title: Beasts And Dragons, Rise Of Garmadon
programme.desc: Zane, Jay, and Kai remember some of Ninjago's fearsome creatures so that Cole defend the cave from an unidentified monster. But Ninja confront memories of their greatest villain and ally, Garmadon, before the threat to Zane controls him completely.

programme.title: The Oni And The Dragon
programme.desc: While Princess Harumi learns to adjust to the life of a Ninja, Lloyd and Jay search for answers about the Oni Masks at Mystake's Tea house, while Cole and Zane attempt to infiltrate the Sons of Garmadon biker gang. Remembering that Lloyd managed to arrest one of the gang members at Borg Tower, the Ninja decide to interrogate him to ascertain the location of the third Oni Mask. In order to get him to talk, however, Cole suggests they visit MYSTAKE'S TEA HOUSE to obtain some "truth tea." The truth-tea backfires spectacularly when Cole accidentally switches cups and drinks the tea himself. Zane is able to salvage the situation, however, and obtains a lead. He learns that the Sons of Garmadon frequent a karaoke bar called LAUGHY'S. Zane and Cole don disguises to infiltrate the bar. Cole assumes the alter ego “Rocky Dangerbuff," while Zane adopts the subtler moniker "Snake Jaguar." In order to earn the gang's trust, Cole performs a karaoke routine that is a smash success. Unfortunately, during the routine, his disguise comes loose and he is exposed as a ninja. The Sons of Garmadon attack him, and Zane (who is still in disguise) is unable to intervene. Cole is taken prisoner while Zane is invited back to the Sons of Garmadon's secret base.

programme.title: The Pranks
programme.desc: The friends are using their talents to pull a prank on Olivia. But who gets the last laugh? Stephanie finds the perfect front page story for the school paper! It's almost too good to be true. Emma and Andrea go undercover to solve the mystery of the two Jacobs.

programme.title: Getting Out the Vote
programme.desc: It's Stephanie vs. Tanya for Heartlake High Class President. But when Tanya resorts to dirty tricks, Stephanie decides to give her a taste of her own medicine. Elect Tanya as Heartlake High Class President?! "NOOOOOOOO!!!!" Not if Friends Stephanie, Emma, Olivia, Mia and Andrea can help it. The Friends are there to help their pal Matthew defeat Tanya -- even when Emma gets carried off by "Vote For Matthew" balloons! But Tanya figures since "Daddy" is now the Mayor of Heartlake City, she doesn't have to play by the rules. When she sneakily sabotages Matthew's campaign, it's time for a determined Stephanie to take his place as candidate. With the help of her friends, Stephanie is set on running a clean campaign -- that is, until Tanya resorts to more dirty tricks, and Stephanie decides to give Tanya a taste of her own medicine.

programme.title: Getting Tthe Message
programme.desc: brute and worse - the boys locker room!text that accidentally sounds like a pledge of Emma's they need to brave space rides, dunking booths, an angry innocent text to Mia was sent to Matthew by mistake -- a phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, BFF's, the Friends must scramble to retrieve Matthew's twisted than a funhouse mirror? A text gone wrong! The As the Friends enjoy Heartlake Amusement Park, Emma types a text to Mia, but sends it to Matthew by mistake a text that could be mega-embarrassing for Emma! As her BFF's, the Friends race to find Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they must brave space rides, dunking booths and worse: the boys locker room! What's more frightening than a roller coaster? More Friends' fun day at Heartlake Amusement Park turns into a frantic race against time when Emma discovers that her undying love for Matthew! Mega-embarrassing! As Emma's

programme.title: The Grateful Dud
programme.desc: At the Country Club where she teaches horseback riding after school, Mia's heroic rescue of a puppy and horse earns the overwhelming gratitude of their owner, a teen bulldozer named Fiona. But when Fiona's pushy, over-the-top appreciation makes Mia's life a living nightmare, the Friends must Ride To The Rescue! At the Country Club where she teaches horseback riding after school, Mia's heroic rescue of a puppy and horse earns the overwhelming gratitude of their owner, a brassy teen bulldozer named Fiona. Although Fiona means well, her pushy, over-the-top appreciation soon makes Mia's life a living nightmare: embarrassing Mia at school, scaring away her boyfriend, and causing major havoc at the Country Club. The Friends must find a way for Mia to escape Fiona's nonstop gratitude and foil Tanya's sneaky schemes to get Mia kicked out of the club. And when a crisis erupts at the club's Fall Ball and Horse Show, all the Friends have to do some fancy riding to help their BFF save the day.

programme.title: Black Out
programme.desc: The power is out in all of Ninjag, but the hard drive containing the Digital Overlord has disappeared. Some mysterious Stranger has stolen it and is now sending alternatively powered Nindroids to attack the Ninja and capture Lloyd. After destroying the Power Station, the Ninja have dealt a massive blow to the Nindroids, but find getting back to the city troublesome without power. At the Junk Yard, Zane gives half of his heart to revive Pixal to help give guidance in their greater mission. Meanwhile, a mysterious cloaked Interloper steals the hard drive containing the Digital Overlord and creates a new foe for the Ninja to fight… Tech Wu. On the other side of Ninjago, Lloyd is trained by his father to harness his Golden Power to unlock an even greater potential – the power of the First Spinjtzu Master.

programme.title: The Curse Of The Golden Master
programme.desc: The Stranger and the hard drive with the Digital Overlord are still missing. The ninjas' search for them brings them deep underground where they are assisted by an old enemy. But the Stranger and his Nindroids are getting ever closer to capturing Lloyd. The Ninja return to a powerless New Ninjago City and visit the Serpentine Tombs in effort to solve who had taken the hard drive containing the Digital Overlord – only to discover the snakes have gone straight. They learn of Serpentine Lore that a Golden Master will conquer all of Ninjago. The Nindroids attack, but with the help from Scales and his Serpentine ilk, they fight off the enemy and discover the culprit they are after is none other than Pythor! But it's too late… the Digital Overlord and his henchman have captured Lloyd in a plot to sap his Golden Power to finally become flesh.

programme.title: Enter The Digiverse
programme.desc: Pythor the Anachondrai and his Nindroids have captured Lloyd and are draining his golden powers to bring the Overlord back into Ninjago. And the Ninja must use the Techno Blades in a daring rescue … inside the Overlord's corrupted hard drive. Unable to save Lloyd in time, the Ninja resort to drastic measures. With the help from Borg's advanced technology, the Ninja get digitized with their Techno Blades into the Digiverse in order to battle the Digital Overlord on his own turf and erase evil for good. While the Ninja learn new capabilities and explore the fantasy of a ‘digital world', their friends must protect them from Pythor and his army in the ‘real world'. In the climatic conclusion, the Ninja ‘reboot the system' and save Sensei Wu and Lloyd, but the Digital Overlord has managed to become flesh in the nick of time, only to be in a weakened state.

programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: When the Ninja receive an invitation to partake in the Tournament of Elements and a clue that Zane might be alive, they accept and travel to a Lost Island owned by notorious crime lord Master Chen in order to save their friend. The loss of Zane has fractured the team of Ninja, but when a mysterious invitation to Master Chen's ‘Tournament of Elements' arrives, everything is thrown into question – Is Zane alive, and are there others out there with powers like them? Sensei Garmadon warns them not to trust Master Chen, but they go in order to find Zane and make the team whole. On route to the island, the Ninja are briefly introduced to the other unique fighters with elemental powers, and the mysterious and beautiful Skylor intrigues Kai. Kai gets into a humbling scrap with Karlof, the Master of Metal, and learns some fights must be done on your own.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Comet Is Coming!: Papa's note to the Smurfs about viewing a comet is delivered torn. The Smurfs read only the first part and think their world is coming to an end. They plan how to spend their last day until Papa returns to clear up the misunderstanding and assure them that they are safe.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Rose: Smurfette promises Mother Nature that if she creates a blue rose Smurfette will never cut it. But when the white rose becomes blue, Smurfette becomes white. The only way to make Smurfette blue again is for her to cut the rose. She reluctantly cuts the rose, returning nature to normalcy and learning that one cannot always keep a promise.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Sky Is Smurfing: Scaredy Smurf runs into the Village screaming about the sky being about to smurf down. And just at the same moment, Papa Smurf is beset by uncontrollable fits of sneezing...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel's Giant: The evil wizard Gargamel wants to create a monster. A horrible, gigantic creature, an awesome being that is going to destroy all the Smurfs! But Gargamel makes a slight mistake, and the result is going to astonish him and his cat Azrael.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sweepy Smurf: Sweepy the chimney sweep Smurf is not the most popular inhabitant of the Village of the Smurfs. He is rather messy, and the clouds of soot that he makes certainly don't add to his popularity. Only the Smurflings find him great company as he's the only one who can get dirty and not be told off. Yet in their enthusiasm for Sweepy, the Smurflings endanger the Village.

programme.title: How To Smurf A Rainbow
programme.desc: Mother Nature is too busy to conjure a rainbow for the Smurfs' festival, so Papa Smurf borrows her cookbook and mixes up the recipe himself. As there is no yellow available, they use the leprechaun's gold to produce a beautiful rainbow before Gargamel can steal it.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Golden Smurf Award: Hogatha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs in order to use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream. Vanity convinces her to try his recipe and before long, the wicked sorceress is covered with mud and sent careening over the hills into Gargamel's house.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Never Smurf Off Till Tomorrow: A fierce wind carries the Smurfs' windmill away, with several Smurfs inside. Is Lazy Smurf really at fault or is an injustice being committed? Are the captive Smurfs going to be saved from the volcano's crater? Is Brainy going to smurf up his mouth for a moment?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sideshow Smurfs: Clumsy and Smurfette are captured by the wicked Bombast, who plans to exhibit them in his sideshow. Papa Smurf hurries to their rescue and using the bungling Gargamel for interference is able to rescue his Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Laugh: Gargamel has found a new diabolical scheme to get rid of the Smurfs: a glittering powder that is going to reduce them to helpless laughter...

programme.title: The Littlest Witch
programme.desc: On an errand to Witch Haven for Papa Smurf, the little blue creatures meet a tiny witch and teach her how to be good while at the same time cause another witch to lose her wicked powers for one year after she falls into the river.

programme.title: The Trojan Smurf
programme.desc: Gargamel, the evil wizard, has devised a new plan to capture the Smurfs: he builds a giant statue in the shape of Papa Smurf. Thus, he hopes, the Smurfs are going to drag the statue into their Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Puppy Prescription: Gargamel conjures a spell that makes Puppy think he's a cat. Papa receives a prescription from Homnibus to reverse the spell and all the Smurfs help. As Puppy becomes a dog again, Gargamel gets too close and he becomes a cat.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa Smurf, Papa Smurf: Yes, there can be too much of a good thing. When an accident happens to Papa Smurf's magic formula and he ends up multiplied by two, the Smurfs are elated: two Papa Smurfs can give twice the good counsel and twice the loving that one can. But after a while, things get too complex in the Village. Especially when another accident doubles the number of Gargamels!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Golden Smurf Award: Hogatha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs in order to use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream. Vanity convinces her to try his recipe and before long, the wicked sorceress is covered with mud and sent careening over the hills into Gargamel's house.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel's Giant: The evil wizard Gargamel wants to create a monster. A horrible, gigantic creature, an awesome being that is going to destroy all the Smurfs! But Gargamel makes a slight mistake, and the result is going to astonish him and his cat Azrael.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Grouchy Makes A Splash: We all know Grouchy Smurf hates a lot of things. But one thing he hates more than anything else is water, when there is enough of it to drown in. You see, Grouchy can't swim. And when the Smurfs notice this peculiarity and try to teach him how to survive in water, the evil wizard Gargamel makes things a little more dangerous than they ought to be....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf The Other Cheek: Hefty Smurf meets an old Trolless in the forest, and the old crone begs him to relieve her of a red spot on her nose by... giving her a good kick here and now! Hefty half-heartedly obliges... And the result is a big surprise for him!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bookworm Smurf: Brainy Smurf is aghast. Sassette cannot read, and thus might be forever prevented from learning the pearls of wisdom collected in his book "Brainy Smurf's quotations"! He tries teaching her how to read. What she can read almost from the start is a formula to make all the books disappear! All the books in the world, including Gargamel's spells and Homnibus' books of remedies!

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Dennis breaks his bike, Dad is unable to afford a new one, so Dennis convinces him to ask his boss for a raise. Unfortunately, Mr Scrimp reduces his wages instead. Dennis then trashes his house to convince Scrimp that his family are poor, so that Mr Scrimp will feel compelled to raise Dad's wages. Just as Scrimp has been taken in by Dennis' plan, Mum and Dad arrive home laden with shopping bags, resulting in Dad getting fired on the spot. Dennis resolves to get Dad his old job back by secretly causing chaos at his office. To restore order Scrimp rehires Dad, sealing the deal with a generous pay rise. Mum and Dad repair the house, but still don't have enough money to buy Dennis a new bike, instead it gets repaired with Dad's office rubber bands and paperclips. Based on the 17th century Chinese invasion of Korea and its subsequent subjugation of the royal court. 1636, Korea's Joseon kingdom is invaded by a Chinese army aligned with the Manchu Qing dynasty. King Injo and his men take refuge in a mountain fortress, but the bitter feud continues.

programme.title: Pennywise: The Story of It
programme.desc: Exploring the 1990 mini-series, based on Stephen King's iconic novel IT, this documentary tells a story heard by few and showcases a wealth of behind-the-scenes footage and photos seen by even fewer. From investigating the cultural phenomenon of coulrophobia (the fear of clowns) to Tim Curry's magical portrayal of the notorious clown monster, this story promises to dig deeper into the Pennywise phenomenon than ever before! Featuring interviews with many of the cult classic's key players, including director Tommy Lee Wallace and cast members Tim Curry, Seth Green, and Richard Thomas.

programme.title: Poster Boys
programme.desc: When broke Irishman, Al Clancy, mistakenly agrees to mind his smart-ass 10-year-old nephew, Karl, for a week, his job and home are placed in jeopardy. In a bold bid to save Al's unfulfilling but undemanding job as a poster boy, they steal the family camper-van, embarking on a madcap, impulsive postering tour across Ireland. But the unlikely pair soon discover it may be more difficult than they realised to survive a week in each other's company... An "Irish gem that will have you in stitches" (Film Ireland), this semi-autobiographical comedy from debut Director Dave Minogue received its world premiere at this year's Galway Film Fleadh. An independent production featuring a range of brilliant new Irish talent (and a memorable cameo from Boyzone/Corrie's Keith Duffy!), this festival favourite is a road-trip adventure with undeniable heart and an uplifting message at its core that families need to look out for each other no matter what circumstances they may find themselves in.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: From the twisted minds behind Saw IV, V and Saw VI, The Collector is a real-time game of cat-and-mouse, melding primal horror with a cracking suspense thriller. An ex-con, Arkin (Josh Stewart) is trying to get his life back on track, and out of desperation decides to rob his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps. As the seconds tick down to midnight, Arkin becomes a reluctant hero trapped by a masked "Collector" in a maze of lethal invention, while trying to rescue the very family he came to rob.

programme.title: The Flowers of War
programme.desc: In 1937, as the invading Japanese Imperial Army overruns China's capital city, desperate civilians seek refuge behind the protective walls of a western cathedral. Here, John Miller (Christian Bale), an American is barricaded with a group of schoolgirls and thirteen courtesans. With nowhere to run and nowhere to hide, fate always has a way of bringing the most unlikely heroes together.

programme.title: Occupation: Rainfall
programme.desc: From the VFX team behind The Last Jedi, this sci-fi action epic stars Harry Potter's Jason Isaacs, The Mandalorian's Temuera Morrison and The Hangover's Ken Jeong. After an intergalactic invasion of Earth, the resistance uncover a plot that could see a decisive end to the war. But with the alien invaders hell-bent on making Earth their home, the race is on to save the planet.

programme.title: Lowlife
programme.desc: What happens when you throw together a fallen Mexican wrestler with serious rage issues, a just-out-of-prison ex-con with a regrettable face tattoo, and a recovering junkie motel owner in search of a kidney? That's the premise of the berserk, blood-spattered, and wickedly entertaining feature debut from Ryan Prows.

programme.title: Mercenary for Justice
programme.desc: Steven Seagal plays tough mercenary John Seeger in this high octane actioner. When Seeger is blackmailed into leading a highly dangerous rescue attempt to free a billionaire's kidnapped son in South Africa, he commits to the job. But when he discovers that he's been double-crossed the gloves come off - and now there's going to be hell to pay. Also starring Luke Goss and Michael Kenneth Williams.

programme.title: Redwood
programme.desc: Breakout film at Frightfest Festival and a must-watch for all horror fans! Josh and Beth visit a secluded national park for some quality time. Ignoring the advice of the Park Rangers, they venture off trail and come face to face with Redwood's legendary wildlife. A fresh spin to a well-worn mythology, creating an edge-of-your seat movie to shred your nerves and make you think twice about camping.

programme.title: Haunt
programme.desc: A terrifying and engaging, possession horror about a family who have recently moved into a cursed house, which had caused the death of the previous family to occupy it. A frightening and powerful character-driven haunted-house horror, starring Jacki Weaver (Silver Linings Playbook), Harrison Gilbertson (Need for Speed) and Liana Liberato (The Best of Me).

programme.title: Home For Harvest
programme.desc: (2019) Charming romance with Brigitte Kingsley. A writer is assigned to cover a story in the town she left, heartbroken, years ago - only to find herself torn between her ex and a new man in town...

programme.title: Farmer Seeking Love
programme.desc: (2021) Barnyard beau-mance with Jesse Hutch. A TV producer tries to convince a handsome farmer to join a reality dating show to harvest better ratings, but finding romance is no walk in the cornfield.

programme.title: Sweet As Maple Syrup
programme.desc: (2021) Romantic comedy starring Brooke Nevin. Rachelle teams up with a charming professor to save her family's maple orchard ahead of a maple syrup festival - but will they end up stuck on each other?

programme.title: A Very Country Wedding
programme.desc: (2019) Romance with Greyson Holt and Bea Santos. With a wedding on pause and groom on tour-can one couple's love stay in tune, or will distance turn their duet into a solo act?

programme.title: The Irresistible Blueberry Farm
programme.desc: (2016) Romance starring Alison Sweeney. Ellen sets off on a journey to fulfil her grandmother's dying wish, but will she find true love on the way?

programme.title: Love's Second Chance
programme.desc: Passionate fashion stylist Rose is living her best life in NYC when she suddenly inherits her grandmother's vintage dress shop and must return to her small hometown. There, she runs into her charming high school crush Cole Murphey, who helps her renovate the store.

programme.title: Elvis And Anabelle
programme.desc: After a miracle, a beauty queen and a small town boy are thrown together in this life affirming story of young love.

programme.title: Ophelia
programme.desc: A dynamic and lavish re-imagining of Shakespeare's 'Hamlet' starring Daisy Ridley, Naomi Watts and Clive Owen.

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: A womanizing Viagra salesman with no sense of direction or responsibility falls in love with a free-spirited woman.

programme.title: A Good Woman
programme.desc: The seductive Mrs. Erlynne (Helen Hunt) travels to Amalfi, Italy, hoping to win over married aristocrat Robert Windermere. But when Windermere's innocent wife Meg (Scarlett Johansson) hears of the scandal, she plots an elaborate revenge.

programme.title: Falling in Love at Christmas
programme.desc: Miranda and Paul, two rivals, meet on a costumed Santa crawl and spend a romantic evening together without learning each other's identities. As their anonymous romance continues online, their businesses merge, forcing them into an unwanted partnership.

programme.title: Finding Mrs. Claus
programme.desc: When Mrs. Claus (Mira Sorvino) feels neglected by her less than attentive husband (Will Sasso), she goes to Las Vegas to help a little girl with her Christmas wish.

programme.title: Under the Mistletoe
programme.desc: Starring Jaime Ray Newman, Michael Shanks, and Conan Graham. At Christmas, the tables turn on a selfless single mom when a local radio station takes over her love life after an innocent call from her 8-year-old son.

programme.title: 12 Days of Giving
programme.desc: When Baxter decides to become a Secret Santa to the people in his hometown and the joy of giving at Christmas spreads across town. Along the way, he forms a close friendship with Pamela and her son Westin. But there's one problem, he's already engaged!

programme.title: Passport to Love
programme.desc: Nicole, a successful travel blogger, meets Kade, a marketing rep for a travel publishing company, and they form the beginnings of a relationship while exploring an island destination. They juggle their work traveling around the world while seeing each other again. Both know there's something special between them, but it will be put to the test when Kade's competitive boss challenges Kade to thwart Nicole's business.

programme.title: Runaway Romance
programme.desc: Reality TV star Ann Stanway leaves Hollywood and finds herself in Amish country where she discovers friendship, new love and ultimately herself. In the end, Ann must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one.

programme.title: The Beautiful Beast
programme.desc: The classic Beauty and the Beast tale told with a twist! Isabelle is all beauty - on the outside. When she gets lost on a skiing vacation, she is helped by Jeremy, a man hiding from the world and his past. He's the first person to put Isabelle in her place, and Isabelle realizes she might be more beast than she wants to admit. Through Jeremy's influence she begins to change - and fall in love.

programme.title: A Royal Surprise
programme.desc: When Riley's boyfriend, Mandla, invites her to South Africa to meet his family, she is shocked to discover that he is a prince. The news puts Riley's trust in Mandla in jeopardy, and he must do what he can to win her love back.

programme.title: The Wrong Crush
programme.desc: High school track star, Amelia, is running from a troubled past.

programme.title: Jennifer/Sampson/Norina
programme.desc: Jennifer, a young lawyer, must use all of her instincts.

programme.title: The Choking Game
programme.desc: Taryn, dubbed 'breath sister', hides Choking Game secret.

programme.title: The Bling Ring
programme.desc: Zack, Natalie and others begin breaking into the homes of celebrities.

programme.title: The Wrong Crush
programme.desc: High school track star, Amelia, is running from a troubled past.

programme.title: Lethal Beauty
programme.desc: A masseuse pays the price for being a good Samaritan when the young woman she helps turns out to be a killer.

programme.title: The Wrong Husband
programme.desc: Melanie discovers her husband is actually his twin, Alex, back to steal his life—and willing to kill for it.

programme.title: Killer on the Island
programme.desc: On vacation with her husband, a woman suspects a local of multiple murders and fears she's next.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: At the Gamma Christmas Mixer, Sarah is missing and her friends' search leads to a shocking attack.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Most leave for break, while a few stay behind. Rick is pushed to his breaking point and flips out on Allison.

programme.title: Maria My Love
programme.desc: A young woman named Ana is struggling to deal with her mother's death and her father's mistakes. In an effort to feel better, she reconnects with her half-sister Grace, (Lauren Fales) and, inspired by a new boyfriend (Brian Rieger), sets out on a quest to find someone to help. Though excited and hopeful when she meets an eccentric woman named Maria (Karen Black), she soon discovers Maria is a compulsive hoarder, and is swept up in a situation more emotionally and morally complicated than she had expected to find. Inspired by a true story.

programme.title: As Good As It Gets
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning (best actor Jack Nicholson, best actress Helen Hunt) offbeat comedy celebrates the unique bond between three very different characters. Also stars Greg Kinnear.

programme.title: Stripes (1981)
programme.desc: STRIPES is a hilarious film with Bill Murray as an irresponsible goof-off who has just lost his job, his girl, his apartment and his car. As he ponders his fate, it occurs to him that enlisting in the Army seems to be a sensible career move. He persuades his friend to join him and soon they find themselves in boot camp surrounded by misfits.

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: Deuce Bigalow takes a vacation to Amsterdam to reconnect with his pal T.J. and visit a world famous aquarium. But when T.J. is falsely accused of murder, Deuce must return to romancing lonely women in order to smoke out the real killer. Along the way, he must compete against real European gigolos and he falls in love with the police chief's daughter.

programme.title: Guarding Tess
programme.desc: A beloved but cantankerous former First Lady engages in a battle of wills with her bodyguard.

programme.title: I'll Die for Vengeance
programme.desc: A Mexican gang headed by vicious Pedro terrorizes the land between New Mexico and Arizona.

programme.title: Satan's Cradle
programme.desc: Crooked lawyer Steve Gentry plans to take over Silver City, killing Jim Mason and framing it as an accident. He then uses a fake marriage certificate to seize Mason's property. Preacher Henry Lane tries to rally the townspeople, but is attacked. The Cisco Kid and Pancho arrive to expose Gentry's plot and restore peace to Silver City.

programme.title: Man Who Cried for Revenge
programme.desc: Davy Flanagan, a former Union officer who was part of an attempt to break out of a Confederate prison camp during the Civil War and suffered a blow to the head that left him with amnesia. Then a bounty hunter shows up to collect a bounty on his head as a deserter.

programme.title: Four Rode Out
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal sets out to bring in a Mexican bandit accused of killing his girlfriend's father, but it turns out that there's more to the story than there first appears to be.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother is pitted against brother in this tale of feuding ranchers in the Old West.

programme.title: Don't Bother to Knock
programme.desc: Having too many girlfriends for his own comfort and safety, a lively young travel agent's troubles begin when he mislays the key to his flat and a friend presents him with several more with his name and address attached. Sentimentally, he gives one to each of the glamorous girls he meets on a continental holiday - all of whom turn up at his flat just as he is planning to marry someone else!

programme.title: The Bargee
programme.desc: Hemel's adventures and his entanglements with irascible lock-keeper Hugh Griffith and skirmishes with boating playboy Eric Sykes make this the narrow boats comedy of the year.

programme.title: Big Job
programme.desc: An inept gang of bank robbers led by George The Brain is caught and sentenced to 15 years hard labour each. When they are released from prison they start out to collect the money they had stolen, which George had hidden in a hollow tree during the chase in which they were caught.

programme.title: Doctor in the House
programme.desc: Comedy. Medical student Simon Sparrow deals with the issues of working in a hospital.

programme.title: Evil Empire: Friday the 13th Chapter 2
programme.desc: A series of serial killings known as the "Suicide Syndrome" continue to occur simultaneously, and the whereabouts of both Phillip and Cheong-ha, who were investigating the case, remain mysterious. Meanwhile, the young police officer Jae-hyeok, who provided crucial clues to Cheong-ha in her time of crisis, finds himself relentlessly pursued by killers dispatched from Japan and the United States. Despite relying on information from an anonymous woman who calls him unilaterally, Jae-hyeok unwittingly gets drawn closer to the center of the case as the situation progresses. GenreAt the same time, in a hospital in Pyongyang, North Korea, a female doctor discovers a phenomenon where the cells of the deceased are being revived. However, she is forced to flee to South Korea due to the authorities' pursuit. What is the key to the case that Jae-hyeok holds? Why are ruthless killers from the United States pursuing him? Why is the foreign police from Japan investigating the "Suicide Syndrome" in Korea? And why is North Korea trying to conceal the truth about a secret project from the Japanese military?

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: Temporary women workers as docile as a lamb lock arms together against mighty money.

programme.title: BTOB TIME: BE TOGETHER THE MOVIE
programme.desc: A treat for the fans who have been with us for the past 10 years, an honest concert movie to watch and listen to! Fans can be healed by enjoying the healing power of BTOB's 10th anniversary concert! The fans who are filling up the concert seats, proved their power when all tickets were SOLD OUT. The 10th anniversary concert is live. BTOB's behind-the-scenes stories about the preparation process for the concert that you will never see anywhere else. Delightful, but serious BTOB member's honest stories! The path that no one can easily follow, showing the footsteps of BTOB's last 10 years! Let's start, the song we sing together, MELODY!

programme.title: Just for you
programme.desc: A road movie about young people who heal their wounds from love through busking in the streets of Vietnam.

programme.title: The Boxer
programme.desc: Even though Dong-seok won last year's national tournament, people credit his father for the achievement. Dong-seok quits the gym and makes a living out of part-time jobs. One day, he hears about his father's death and the truth he was not aware of. He returns to the gym to bring back his glory.

programme.title: Breaking Infinity
programme.desc: A scientific researcher who has become unstuck in time must figure out what happened to him and stop the coming end of the world.

programme.title: Ultrasound
programme.desc: A dark puzzle-box sci-fi in the vein of ‘Memento' and ‘Primer'. When his car breaks down, Glen must spend a hellish night with a married couple, which sets off a series of events destined to change their lives.

programme.title: Under The Crystal Sky
programme.desc: In the 1800s, in the American Southwest, an Indigenous family witness a UFO crash near their home. Following the extraterrestrial event, strange occurrences transpire around them. The family must confront their fear of the extraterrestrial while also fending off the encroaching American military.

programme.title: Implanted
programme.desc: Sarah, a struggling young woman living in Brooklyn, agrees to volunteer as an experimental test subject for a company to be implanted with a nanochip in her cerebral cortex. When the implant turns sinister and orders her to commit crimes, Sarah has only one choice: to live or die.

programme.title: Last Sentinel
programme.desc: Set in the future on a war-ravaged Earth, four soldiers man Sentinel – a remote military base in a vast ocean that separates two warring continents. They await the relief or the enemy, whichever comes first.

programme.title: I'll Be Next Door For Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone in Nicky's family is mad for Christmas - except her! When her boyfriend visits she hires actors to stage a fake Christmas and save her from embarrassment. Stars Juliette Angelo (2018)

programme.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
programme.desc: (2018) Well-heeled romance with Candace Cameron Bure. After being dumped over Christmas, a woman ignores the season, until a quirky guardian angel helps her find her festive spirit - and maybe love!

programme.title: Finding Father Christmas
programme.desc: (2016) Family drama with Erin Krakow and Niall Matter. Miranda never knew who her father was, but when she finds a clue about his identity, will this Christmas deliver what she's always longed for?

programme.title: Christmas in the Air
programme.desc: Robert, a widower and father of two children, enlists Lydia to help him juggle his chaotic work-life balance at Christmastime. Will their close relationship lead to love? Stars Catherine Bell. (2017)

programme.title: Christmas Wedding Planner
programme.desc: (2017) Romantic drama with Jocelyn Hudon. A woman is hired to plan her cousin's elaborate wedding and things are going perfectly - until a handsome stranger arrives asking questions about the groom.

programme.title: Relic Hunter
programme.desc: Tia Carrere ('Wayne's World') stars as Sydney Fox, a university professor and black belt who globe-trots after lost, stolen and rumored-to-exist artifacts and antiquities.

programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.desc: Miles Logan (Martin Lawrence) is a talented jewel thief who has stolen $20 million dollars worth of diamonds and has hidden them at a construction site before being captured. Now, after three years in jail, he returns to pick up the diamonds only to find that the site is now a police precinct.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Al Pacino and Johnny Depp head an all-star cast in this brilliant gangland thriller about an undercover FBI agent who befriends a hitman to gain entry to the mob.

programme.title: Lake Placid (1999)
programme.desc: A female paleontologist from New York City heads to Maine where local fish and game officials have discovered a gigantic and deadly 30-foot crocodile that appears to be living in one of the local .akes.

programme.desc: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings, as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager, to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.

programme.desc: In the wake of the BP oil spill Colin Price rockets to political stardom. But when his extra marital affair is exposed, his wife leaves him and his career is in ruins.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: Brothers tells the powerful story of two siblings, thirty-something Captain Sam Cahill and younger brother Tommy Cahill, who are polar opposites.

programme.title: I Am Woman
programme.desc: The story of Helen Reddy, who in 1966 landed in NYC with her three-year-old daughter, a suitcase and $230 in her pocket. Within five years she was one of the biggest superstars of her time, and an icon of the 1970s feminist movement.

programme.desc: As the Roman empire collapses, young Romulus Augustus must leave the city and set out for a dangerous journey to Britain to locate his last legion of supporters.
